description: This short nature trail takes you through a stand of aspens, past a group of ancient Douglas firs with their corrugated bark, to a pleasant viewpoint. Waypoints start at parking lot.
directions: Transcanada Hwy - exit 1A northwest of Banff, Park at Muleshoe lot. Head north on Muleshoe trail (north of restrooms) across hwy 1A.
title: Muleshoe Trail
